milkshake.title: Milkshake
milkshake.tagline: The cows gallop freely in a frenetic battle for FAME and GLORY
cardDescription: The cows gallop freely in a frenetic battle for FAME and GLORY. Use an INCREDIBLY IRRESPONSIBLE AMOUNT OF WEAPONS to defeat your bovine rivals.
One shot won't be enough to send you to the slaughterhouse, try hard. THIS IS MILKSHAKE
This game was created as an entry for the Global Game Jam 2024.
gameDescription: Year 2017. The cows gallop freely in a frenetic battle for FAME and GLORY. Use an INCREDIBLY IRRESPONSIBLE AMOUNT OF WEAPONS to defeat your bovine rivals and gain followers. One shot won't be enough to send you to the slaughterhouse, try hard. THIS IS MILKSHAKE.
This is a local multiplayer game for Up to 4 players.

Fight your friends with strange weapons fow a cow. Use your udders to shoot milk over your enemies, or get a chicken and make them explode, but be careful your mom's chancla is arround and it always hits. Don't make your friend too angry or he will charge against you.
Be aware, sometimes there is a strange rain of butcher knives and tractors. And remember to be in the highground when the fleas arrive.
features: Frantic multiplayer battles with up to 4 players

pyramid-of-babel.title: Pyramid Of Babel
pyramid-of-babel.tagline: Explore the deeps of the crypt of the Pyramid of Babel.
cardDescription: Explore the deeps of the crypt from the Pyramid of Babel. Solve ancient puzzles and challenge the assassins from the Order of Silence to claim the knowledge these tombs guard.
This game was created as an entry for Jam2Jam's Winter Jam 2022.
gameDescription: Explore the deeps of the crypt of the Pyramid of Babel. Solve ancient puzzles and challenge the assassins of The Order of Silence to claim the knowledge these tombs guard.
In this game you're inside a maze, the walls contain letters, you have to survive the enemies while you solve the word search game in which you're trapped to unlock de door.
features: An enemy that follows you EVERYWHERE!!

chat-em-up.title: Chat 'Em Up
chat-em-up.tagline: Survive as long as you can. DON'T let your CHAT win.
cardDescription: Twitch interactive game for streamers, foster chat interaction and have fun at the same time with Chat Em Up.
gameDescription: Invite your viewers to challenge you by spawning enemies and bosses with chat commands and channel point rewards.
Survive as long as you can and beat your record or let your chat defeat you.
Twitch interactive game for streamers, foster chat interaction and have fun at the same time with Chat Em Up.

ping-online.title: Ping Online
ping-online.tagline: A classic game recreated. With online mode!!
cardDescription: An ONLINE MULTIPLAYER version of the CLASSIC game PONG. Have fun with your friends everywhere.
Join a grup of up to 4 players to play this game once again whith this new version of the game created in 1972.
gameDescription: An ONLINE MULTIPLAYER version of the CLASSIC game PONG. Have fun with your friends everywhere.
This game was created using MIRROR libary for unity to create the multiplayer system.
After finishing the classic version of the game, I decided to go for more, so I added a 4 PLAYERS GAMEMODE
Game made with learning purposes. Not fully tested.
